name: One Ship Fleet
description:
An extremely challenging top down 2D space shooter that combines elements of both shooters and puzzle-platformers.

You play as the sole survivor of an elite fleet of ships from the army of the Starfighter galaxy, who are in an ongoing war with their nemesis: The Empire of Evil. The war seems to have been lost, and the mission now is to try and find a way back to the Starfighter galaxy using wormholes scattered throughout the galaxy of the Empire of Evil.

- Fight your way through endless hordes of enemies as you unlock and play through 65 levels that get progressively more challenging. 

- Latch onto asteroids and use them to block enemy bullets, smash through obstacles, or hurl them at your foes!

- Different mission objectives such as getting to the extraction points, surviving waves of enemies for a certain amount of time, searching for fuel scattered throughout an area, and defeating enemy bosses!

- Unlock up to 10 ships by collecting coins throughout levels. 

- Custom made soundtrack containing eight original 90's esque music tracks.

Created with the Unity game engine.
